p: Furthermore, the quantitative data showed that a proportion of participants used Shilling oil and Alcolado Glacial to treat the symptoms of CHIKV infection. Alcolado Glacial is a mentholated splash lotion that is produced in Cura√ßao, and the benefits of it have been passed on from generation to generation. People use it for many purposes, for example, to relieve pain and flu-related symptoms.
